title: Compton Health Bar brings world of holistic healing to community
author: Carmen Valencia
description: Founder Dani Solorio's passion blossomed 10 years ago
cleaned_text: COMPTON, Calif. — Compton Health Bar founder Dani Solorio's passion for herbal medicine blossomed 10 years ago during a dark period. Solorio was undocumented and didn't have access to health care. She said it was because of their experiences of being undocumented for 28 years that led to opening up this space for holistic healing. The natural medicine helped Solorio, not only physically, but mentally, spiritually and emotionally.
